body: nit: the name of this method looks more as if you were setting the version counter to a particular values, while what you're doing is changing the version counter associated with this Variable. How about `set_version_counter`?
body_html: nit: the name of this method looks more as if you were setting the version counter to a particular values, while what you're doing is changing the version counter associated with this Variable. How about set_version_counter?
body_text: nit: the name of this method looks more as if you were setting the version counter to a particular values, while what you're doing is changing the version counter associated with this Variable. How about set_version_counter?
